text: (phir baaham kahane lage ki) jab tumane un logon se aur khuda ke siva jin maaboodon kee ye log parasatish karate hain unase kinaara kashee karalee to chalo (phalo) gaar mein ja baitho aur tumhaara paravaradigaar apanee rahamat tum par vaseeh kar dega aur tumhaara kaam mein tumhaare lie aasaanee ke saamaan muhayya karega
